channel.title: How to Use Poison on
channel.description: Recent content in How to Use Poison on

item.title: Introducing Poison
item.description:
Hello! Welcome to my blog!

So let’s hop right in! What’s my goal here?

What I want to do

I want to try and start a community. An online community of all the people like me who are weird enough to desire following Yehovah and His Torah, and also weird enough to really love computers and other nerdy things. Someplace to find like-minded people, to share knowledge and help each other develop new skills.
